overview: A young Russian comes to Paris to meet up with his lover, but he seems to have already found a new friend.  Alone in Paris, Anton has loads of adventures: a quest for powerful love and shared pleasure. But the guys that he meets pass him round after having used and abused him!  These boys have an urgent need to live and make love, to face up to jealousy and betrayal. They must face their homosexuality and their families.
title: État d'urgence
